description.zh: n8n 是一个面向技术团队的安全工作流自动化平台，结合了代码的灵活性与无代码工具的高效性。它提供超过 400 个集成、原生 AI 功能，并通过公平代码许可保障部署控制权。平台支持自托管和云部署，适用于企业级应用场景。
description.en: n8n is a secure workflow automation platform designed for technical teams, combining the flexibility of code with the speed of no-code tools. It offers over 400 integrations, native AI capabilities, and deployment control through a fair-code license. The platform supports self-hosting and cloud deployment, making it suitable for enterprise use.

feature.zh:
## 产品优势:

- 兼具代码灵活性与无代码自动化效率
- 通过公平代码许可保障数据与部署控制权
- 可扩展性强，具备高级权限管理和 SSO 支持，适合企业使用
- 拥有活跃社区和持续发展的开发团队

## 功能列表:

- 提供 400 多个预构建服务集成
- 可视化工作流构建器，支持 JavaScript/Python 脚本
- 基于 LangChain 的原生 AI 工作流，支持自定义数据与模型
- 支持自托管与云部署模式
- 支持 npm 包与自定义节点扩展
- 提供可直接使用的流程模板
- 支持离线隔离环境部署
feature.en:
## Benefits:

- Combines the flexibility of code with the speed of no-code automation
- Maintains full data and deployment control with a fair-code license
- Scalable and enterprise-ready with advanced permissions and SSO support
- Actively maintained by a growing community and development team

## Features:

- 400+ pre-built integrations with third-party services
- Visual workflow builder with optional JavaScript/Python scripting
- Native AI agent workflows using LangChain and custom models
- Self-hosting and cloud deployment options
- Support for npm packages and custom node extensions
- Ready-to-use workflow templates
- Air-gapped and secure deployment capabilities
